# tencentcloud-sdk-python-tim

Tencent Cloud Python SDK for TIM (Tencent IM)

## INSTALL

```shell
$ pip install --upgrade tencentcloud-sdk-python-im
```

## EXAMPLES

```shell
>>> from tencentcloud_im.tcim_client import TCIMClient
>>> client = TCIMClient()
>>>
```

## BUILD

```shell
$ python3 -m build
```
